description.0: This polearm was once jointly forged by the craftsmen in the mines as a sacrifice to the spirits of the mountains.

0.0: Decreases Climbing Stamina Consumption by 15% and increases Elemental Skill DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Also, after other nearby party members use Elemental Skills, the equipping character's Elemental Skill DMG will also increase by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 8s.

1.0: Decreases Climbing Stamina Consumption by 15% and increases Elemental Skill DMG by <cryo>15%</cryo>. Also, after other nearby party members use Elemental Skills, the equipping character's Elemental Skill DMG will also increase by <cryo>15%</cryo> for 8s.

4.0: Decreases Climbing Stamina Consumption by 15% and increases Elemental Skill DMG by <cryo>24%</cryo>. Also, after other nearby party members use Elemental Skills, the equipping character's Elemental Skill DMG will also increase by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 8s.
